channel.title: Java error in compile
channel.description:
I have recently downloaded my friends client, and it works fine for all of his friends, but not for me. I get an error of:
'javac' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file
I redownloaded java to make sure it wasn't my java, but it wasnt. It still says it.
Oh, also, don't put just put javac quote chakaboomboom in java c in your gigadrive, i dont know what the hell that is but thats all i see for explanations, so put an easy explanation for it.
P.S: Tico's guide for java is too old,it was destroyed the topic on helping java, so don't say look there.\
Answer:
Answered by:

item.title: Java error in compile
